UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Turning cationic antimicrobial peptide KR-12 into self-assembled nanobiotics with potent bacterial killing and LPS neutralizing activities
Literature.Author: Lei R, Yang C, Sun Y, Li D, Hao L, Li Y, Wu S, Li H, Lan C, Fang X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:18% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
